username.title: AUX Cloud Username
username.description: Email address or phone number registered with AUX Cloud.

region.title: Region
region.description: Select the AUX Cloud region that matches your account.

baseUrl.title: Custom API Base URL
baseUrl.description: Optional override for AUX Cloud API host. Provide this if your AC Freedom app reports "Other Areas" or a custom server.

fanControlMode.title: Fan Control Mode
fanControlMode.description: Choose how the fan speed is exposed. "slider" maps to discrete AUX speeds, "disabled" hides fan speed controls.

enableSwingControl.title: Expose Swing Control
enableSwingControl.description: Disable if you do not want the oscillation toggle exposed in HomeKit.

temperatureUnit.title: Temperature Unit
temperatureUnit.description: Select the unit used when displaying temperatures. Values are converted automatically when talking to AUX Cloud.

temperatureStep.title: Target Temperature Step
temperatureStep.description: Choose the increment for setpoints. 0.5 replicates AC Freedom, 1 limits adjustments to whole degrees. Fahrenheit mode enforces 1Â°F.

featureSwitches.title: Extra Feature Switches
featureSwitches.description: Expose optional HomeKit switches for AUX features like screen display, comfortable wind, mildew prevention, self-clean, health mode, and child lock.

pollInterval.title: Polling Interval (seconds)
pollInterval.description: How frequently the plugin should request updated state from AUX Cloud.

includeDeviceIds.title: Included Device IDs
includeDeviceIds.description: Optional list of AUX endpoint IDs to expose. Leave empty to include every discovered device.

excludeDeviceIds.title: Excluded Device IDs
excludeDeviceIds.description: Optional list of AUX endpoint IDs to skip after discovery.
